ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Many opportunities await me in the future.
Notes: 1= Very Untrue; 7= Very True

ElementDescription: I expect that I will set many new goals in the future.
Notes: 1= Very Untrue; 7= Very True

ElementDescription: My future is filled with possibilities.
Notes: 1= Very Untrue; 7= Very True

ElementDescription: Most of my life lies ahead of me.
Notes: 1= Very Untrue; 7= Very True

ElementDescription: My future seems infinite to me.
Notes: 1= Very Untrue; 7= Very True

ElementDescription: I could do anything I want in the future.
Notes: 1= Very Untrue; 7= Very True

ElementDescription: There is plenty of time left in my life to make new plans.
Notes: 1= Very Untrue; 7= Very True

ElementDescription: I have the sense time is running out. (reverse)
Notes: 1= Very True 7= Very Untrue

ElementDescription: There are only limited possibilities in my future. (reverse)
Notes: 1= Very True 7= Very Untrue

ElementDescription: As I get older, I begin to experience time as limited. (reverse)
Notes: 1= Very True 7= Very Untrue

ElementDescription: Future Time Perspective Scale Mean
I know that I do not have all the time in the world
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: My future is uncertain
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: You cannot really plan for the future because things change so much
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: My future seems very vague and uncertain to me
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I do not focus on the future because it is so uncertain to me anyway
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I look forward to the future with hope and enthusiasm
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: When I think about the future, I expect good things to happen
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I have little hope for the future (Reverse Scored)
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Somewhat agree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat disagree; 5 = Strongly disagree

ElementDescription: Each new day and season presents me with interesting opportunities
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I have the sense that time is running out
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I am beginning to experience that time is limited
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Increasingly I feel like time is against me
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree
